mapper.select: SELECT schedule_no scheduleNo, emp_no empNo, title, content, type, start_datetime startDatetime, end_datetime endDatetime FROM schedule WHERE emp_no = #{empNo} AND type='개인'

SELECT s.schedule_no scheduleNo, s.emp_no empNo, s.title title, s.content content, s.type type, s.start_datetime startDatetime, s.end_datetime endDatetime FROM schedule s LEFT JOIN emp e ON s.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE e.dpt_no = #{dptNo} AND s.`type`='팀';

SELECT r.rsv_no rsvNo, r.room_no roomNo, r.emp_no empNo, r.rsv_date rsvDate, r.start_datetime startDatetime, r.end_datetime endDatetime, r.`type` type, r.rsv_state rsvState, ri.room_place roomPlace, e.dpt_no dptNo, e.emp_name empName FROM room_rsv r INNER JOIN emp e ON r.emp_no = e.emp_no INNER JOIN room_info ri ON r.room_no = ri.room_no WHERE e.dpt_no = #{dptNo} AND r.rsv_state = 1

SELECT h.start_date startDate, h.end_date endDate, h.emergency_contact contact, e.emp_name name FROM day_off_history h INNER JOIN emp e ON h.emp_no = h.emp_no WHERE e.dpt_no = #{dptNo} AND h.cancle_YN = 'N'

SELECT e.emp_name name, b.business_trip_destination destination, b.start_date startDate, b.end_date endDate, b.emergency_contact contact FROM business_trip_history b LEFT JOIN emp e ON b.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE e.dpt_no = #{dptNo} AND b.cancle_YN = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM schedule WHERE emp_no = #{empNo} AND TYPE='개인'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT '휴가' AS category, doh.start_date AS startDate, doh.end_date AS endDate, doh.emp_no AS empNo, '휴가내역' AS title FROM day_off_history doh JOIN emp e ON doh.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE e.dpt_no = #{dptNo} UNION ALL SELECT '출장' AS category, bth.start_date AS startDate, bth.end_date AS endDate, bth.emp_no AS empNo, '출장내역' AS title FROM business_trip_history bth JOIN emp e ON bth.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE e.dpt_no = #{dptNo} UNION ALL SELECT sc.type AS category, sc.start_datetime AS startDate, sc.end_datetime AS endDate, sc.emp_no AS empNo, sc.title AS title FROM schedule sc JOIN emp e ON sc.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE sc.type = '팀' AND e.dpt_no = #{dptNo} ) AS count_result;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM room_rsv r INNER JOIN emp e ON r.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE dpt_no = #{dptNo} AND r.rsv_state = 1

SELECT s.schedule_no scheduleNo, s.emp_no empNo, s.title title, s.content content, s.type type, s.start_datetime startDatetime, s.end_datetime endDatetime, e.emp_name empName FROM schedule s INNER JOIN emp e ON s.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE s.schedule_no = #{scheduleNo}

SELECT e.emp_name empName, sc.title title, sc.content content, sc.type type, sc.start_datetime startDateTime, sc.end_datetime endDateTime FROM schedule sc LEFT JOIN emp e ON sc.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE sc.type = '팀' AND sc.schedule_no = #{scheduleNo}

SELECT doh.day_off_no dayOffNo, e.emp_name empName, doh.start_date startDate, doh.end_date endDate, doh.emergency_contact emergencyContact, doh.cancle_YN cancleYN, doh.cancle_reason cancleReason, doh.use_year useYear, doh.type_name typeName, dd.content content FROM day_off_history doh LEFT JOIN draft_doc dd ON dd.draft_doc_no = doh.draft_doc_no LEFT JOIN emp e ON doh.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE day_off_no = #{scheduleNo}

SELECT e.emp_name empName, e.emp_no empNo, bth.business_trip_destination businessTripDestination, bth.start_date startDate, bth.end_date endDate, bth.cancle_YN cancleYN, bth.cancle_reason cancleReason, bth.emergency_contact emergencyContact, dd.content FROM business_trip_history bth LEFT JOIN draft_doc dd ON bth.draft_doc_no = dd.draft_doc_no LEFT JOIN emp e ON bth.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE bth.business_trip_no = #{scheduleNo}

SELECT ri.room_name roomName, e.emp_name empName, ri.room_place roomPlace, rr.meeting_title meetingTitle, rr.meeting_reason meetingReason, rr.users users, rr.start_datetime startTime, rr.end_datetime endTime, rr.`type` type, rr.rsv_state rsvState FROM room_rsv rr INNER JOIN emp e ON rr.emp_no = e.emp_no INNER JOIN room_info ri ON rr.room_no = ri.room_no WHERE rr.rsv_no = #{rsvNo}
